text: Yu Zeping (; born 23 December 1999) is a Chinese professional footballer player who currently plays for China League Two club Guangxi Baoyun. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="1"|R&F; |2018–19 |rowspan="1"|Hong Kong Premier League |0||0||0||0||1Appearances in the Hong Kong Sapling Cup||0||0||0||0||0||1||0 |- |North District (loan) |2019–20 |Hong Kong First Division |10||3||0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0||10||3 |- ! colspan=3 | Career total !10!!3!!0!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!11!!3 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:Living people Category:Chinese footballers Category:Chinese expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Hong Kong Premier League players Category:Hong Kong First Division League players Category:China League Two players Category:R&F; (Hong Kong) players Category:Expatriate footballers in Hong Kong Category:Chinese expatriate sportspeople in Hong Kong Category:1999 births
